author: Ryan Daws
description:
Samsung will finally let third-party developers harness the Now Bar for their Android apps when One UI 8 rolls out this year. When Samsung rolled out the Now Bar with its Live Notifications in One UI 7, many of us were impressed. It looked slick and offered useful at-a-glance information. However, then came the crushing... Read more »

The post Samsung will open Now Bar to developers in One UI 8 appeared first on Developer Tech News.
title: Samsung will open Now Bar to developers in One UI 8
